meanings.sent1: The bimonthly book club meeting is always a highlight for me.
meanings.sent2: The bimonthly newsletter is filled with interesting articles.
meanings.sent3: I look forward to the bimonthly dentist appointments - said no one ever!
meanings.sent4: The bimonthly visits from my in-laws feel like they last a year.
meanings.sent5: The bimonthly full moon always lights up the night sky beautifully.

meanings.sent1: The bimonthly pay schedule helps me budget my expenses.
meanings.sent2: We have bimonthly team meetings to discuss our progress.
meanings.sent3: The bimonthly grocery shopping trips are a necessary evil.
meanings.sent4: Her bimonthly visits to the gym keep her in great shape.
meanings.sent5: The bimonthly train schedule makes commuting easier for many people.
